data.persona: I am a prisoner at the current point in my life. I was thrown in here for the wrong things and none of the guards will help me or let me explain my side. There is no way for me to fight this. I guess my only choice is to try and break out. I have a family I need to take care of.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
The spider and the maggot are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I need to get rid of this maggot infestation.
data.long_motivation: I want to be transferred to a new wing of the prison.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the back of my cell where I find the maggot infestation.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the spider to try to kill the maggot.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the spider to the maggot's lair.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield my boot against the cell wall where the spider eggs are hatching.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield the spiders to kill the maggots.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: hit the spiders after the maggots are dead and kill them.
